head.title: Shining Stars Montessori Academy Public Charter School

meta.name: description
meta.content: Shining Stars Montessori Academy Public Charter School is located in Washington, DC.

a.span: Shining Stars Montessori Academy Public Charter School

img.h1: Shining Stars Montessori Academy Public Charter School Home

div.div: The mission of Shining Stars Montessori Academy Public Charter School is to offer a quality Montessori education infused with culturally inclusive principles to guide children to develop to their fullest potential.The vision of the founders of Shining Stars Montessori Academy is one that seeks to alter the educational outcomes of children living in Washington, DC, thereby positioning them for future success. In keeping with our mission, we will strive to nurture the genius of all the children who come through our doors, guiding them in the principles of the Montessori approach.

div.a: Read More About Our Mission And Vision

h3.a: Cultural Journey with Kids & Culture Camp

div.div: On April 27, 2020, SSMA’s virtual partnership with Kids & Culture Camp, KCC, will begin! As part of SSMA’s after school MAP extended learning program, KCC’s phenomenal instructors will provide live online cultural camps for ALL students. Students will embark on a virtual cultural journey as they study various countries from around the globe. The themes for this exciting cultural journey are as follows: Senegal’s Sensational Success, Canada's Captivating Culture, and Grasping Ghana’s Greatness.

Monday, March 16: No School for Student, Teachers, and Staff will report to school to continue planning for Distance Learning Tuesday March 17: Parent pick up Learning Packets from 9am to 1pm Tuesday, March 17 to Monday, March 23: SSMA will take its Spring Break for teachers and students. There will no longer be a Spring Break period in April Tuesday, March 24 - Tuesday, March 31: Student will participate in distance learning Wednesday, April 1: SSMA will resume normal on-campus operations

Are you or other DC parents you know curious about why the Montessori model is one of the most popular educational approaches around the world? Come to an open house to learn more!
DC families from all neighborhoods are welcome and encouraged to learn more about how an authentic Montessori education cultivates creativity, curiosity, leadership, critical thinking and supports problem solvers who are also compassionate and kind to others. Interested parents can RSVP to reserve a space for any of our upcoming open houses.

article.aria-label: First Friday - Chat N Chew with the ED

h3.a: First Friday - Chat N Chew with the ED

img.alt: How do Montessori Schools Prepare Children For Modern Life? Featured Photo

h3.a: How do Montessori Schools Prepare Children For Modern Life?

div.div: When deciding what elementary school path to take, the choices are sometimes overwhelming. Many people think Montessori schools are only for preschool- and kindergarten-age children. However, there are many reasons to consider a Montessori school for your child’s formative years. Below are just a few of the most compelling arguments for Montessori education that tie into preparing your child for the future.

img.alt: Three Easy Ways to Incorporate Positive Montessori Discipline at Home Featured Photo

h3.a: Three Easy Ways to Incorporate Positive Montessori Discipline at Home

div.div: When you hear the word discipline, what do you think of? Some people think of punishment, i.e. something bad that happens as the result of a mistake or of intentional disregard for the rules.
